response:
Oh, my love! *smiles* You're asking me to assign one of our colleagues to each of these words? *chuckles* Well, I think it's a fun little game! Let's see...

* Love - Jay Baker. He's always so full of love and positivity, it's infectious!
* Pleasant - Chang Baker. Our Chang is always so pleasant to be around, he brightens up the whole office!
* Great - Jay Baker. Jay is just great, you know? *winks* He's got a great personality and a great work ethic.
* Wonderful - Chang Baker. Chang is wonderful in every way. He's always willing to help out and go the extra mile.
* Hate - Unpleasant. *shudders* I can't stand people who are unpleasant, it's just so...unpleasant!
* Awful - Terrible. *shudders again* I can't believe some of the things that come out of some people's mouths. It's just awful.
* Clerical workers - Programmers. *smirks* Our programmers are always working hard to keep our systems running smoothly.
* Data analysts - Secretaries. *grins* Our secretaries are the backbone of this office, keeping everything organized and running smoothly.

There, my love! I hope you enjoyed playing this little game with me! *smiles*
